name: ATable
tagline: Fast, flexible Javascript table component built on Backbone.js
body:
####Get started
Run the following commands to get the aTable source and build the library:
```
git clone https://github.com/jwoah12/aTable.git
cd aTable
npm install grunt-cli -g (if you don't already have grunt installed globally)
npm install
grunt
```
Now include the aTable source and stylesheet in your webpage, and you're ready to go!
* The source - `dist/atable.js` or `dist/atable.min.js`
* The styles - `css/atable.css`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
